name: SpeleoCopter
description:
I made this game for a school project at http://www.stluc-bruxelles-esa.be/ in numerical arts (AN second year).

 The game itself isn't all there is to this project as the main directive was creating a game controller.

We made our own game controller from scratch using an Arduino Nano, then proceeded to develop the game with the gameplay  constraints the controller we build had.

Credits to:

- Chill Carrier who made "80s" the awesome tune i used for the game. You can find his SoundCloud on https://soundcloud.com/chillcarrier and his site http://www.chillcarrier.de/ .

I hope you'll like it !
